text:
Corrections (Interstate Leave of Absence) Order 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 48 of the Corrections Act 1997 .

17 November 2003

RICHARD BUTLER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Corrections (Interstate Leave of Absence) Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interstate laws
    For the purposes of Part 6 of the Corrections Act 1997 , Part 8A of the Corrections Act 1986 of Victoria is declared to be an interstate law.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 November 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
